ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I do not need premission to kill of my own characters. Besides, if you had taken the time to read my RP s then you would know that Megatron is NOT dead.

OOC: I do not need premission to kill of my own characters. Besides, if you 
had taken the time to read my RP's then you would know that Megatron is NOT 
dead. He mearly transfered his spark into another form in case of an 
emegency. The idea is a bit on the cheesy side but I like to keep my stories 
in motion.

~~~~~~

::: MEGATRON buzzes onto the battle feild to find HELL BEAST, without his 
face plate, loading a gun. He looks up to the diagnostic drone :::

::: HELL BEAST ::: What is this? Are you a decoy?

::: MEGATRON, using a disguised voice ::: No no my leige. I am a diagnostic 
droid. Somehow I was turned on after I fell of a work table. And seeing as 
how Im designed to serve Predacons, I came to seek you.

::: HELL BEAST ::: I see....well, right now you can help us out by sending a 
message to my team telling them we are victorious!

::: MEGATRON ::: Oh, absolutely sir!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: TRANSANULAS arrives at the battle scene. He stops by GREMLIN :::

::: GREMLIN ::: What the hell are you doing here?

::: TRANSANULAS ::: Ive come to make a few changes....help me out.

::: GREMLIN ::: How?

::: TRANSANULAS ::: Put in a good word for me. I want to rejoin you....

::: GREMLIN laughs and they both fire apun the Maximals :::
